abstract: Independent autopsy finds that Antonio Zambrano-Montes was shot seven times by police in Pasco, Wash, with at least two entry wounds on the back of his body, contradicting official account by police.
lead_paragraph: The autopsy of an unarmed Mexican man killed by the police showed he was shot up to seven times, including twice from behind, a lawyer for the man’s family said Thursday.

headline.main: Washington: Autopsy Contradicts Officials’ Account of Pasco Shooting

snippet: The autopsy of an unarmed Mexican man killed by the police showed he was shot up to seven times, including twice from behind, a lawyer for the man’s family said Thursday.
